verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w eightieth|strong="H8084"\w* \f + \fr 6:1 \ft Hebrew; LXX four hundred and fortieth\f* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ziv|strong="H2099"\w*,\f + \fr 6:1 \ft Ziv was the second month of the ancient Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of April and May; also in verse 37.\f* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*’s \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w began|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

God’s Promise to Solomon

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w abandon|strong="H5800"\w* \w My|strong="H8432"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.” The Temple’s Interior (2 Chronicles 3:5–9)
So \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w it|strong="H1129"\w*.

\w In|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w inner|strong="H1687"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H1687"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w*, \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* cubits \w high|strong="H6967"\w*, \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w olive|strong="H8081"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w* \w inside|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* innermost \w room|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.
